# invalidate(view:)

**Instance Method**

Indicates to the system that an aspect of a view is invalid and triggers the necessary update.

## Declaration

```swift
func invalidate(view: NSView)
```

## Parameters

- **view**: The view that requires invalidating.

## Discussion

A type that conforms to `UIViewInvalidating` implements this method to perform any actions necessary to notify the system that an aspect of your view is invalid. For more info, see [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSView/Invalidating].

## Supporting Types

- **NSView.Invalidations**: Changes that cause aspects of a view to be invalid and require an update.
